g2:c.DATA-SERVER-PARAMETERS.g2:a.DATA-SERVER-ALIASES: rdb implies service through GSI data server

g2:c.BORDERLESS-FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: A procedure may be named in the attribute-shown-in-column slot instead of an attribute-name. This allows for other items to be placed in the column, like buttons, etc.
The tagname attribute allows for a scroll-area to be found using gspcs-get-scroll-area.

The action-to-perform-before-scrolling slot of scroll-arrows may name a procedure that does something useful like moving user-entered column values into the scrolled item of the row. This is useful because the scrolled column items are transient, and deleted when the scroll-arrows are selected.
attribute-shown-in-column typically names the attribute of the scrolled item whose value will be placed in this column.

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: add one
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: in order create an gspcs-recipe R and conclude that the temperature of R = the number of elements in scroll-list-1 + 1 and conclude that the pressure of R = random (1, 100) and conclude that the mix-time of R = random (1, 100) and start gspcs-insert-item-into-scroll-list (scroll-list-1, R)

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: remove one
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: start gspcs-remove-item-from-scroll-list (scroll-list-1, the last item in scroll-list-1)

g2:c.BORDERLESS-FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: Called from more than one place:

g2:c.FUNCTION-DEFINITION.g2:a.TEXT: gspcs-alignment-x-position (ALIGNMENT, HEADER, ITEM) = ( if ALIGNMENT is left then (fun-left-edge (HEADER) + (the item-width of ITEM / 2)) else if ALIGNMENT is right then (fun-right-edge (HEADER) - (the item-width of ITEM / 2)) else the item-x-position of HEADER)

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: SELECT-ITEM
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: the selection-status of the item exists and the item is not a kb-workspace and there exists an gspcs-scroll-area SA such that (the workspace of SA exists and the workspace of SA is the same object as the workspace of the item and there exists an item-list L that is scrolled-upon SA such that (the item is a member of the item list L))
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: start gspcs-select-item (the item, the workspace of the item, this window)

g2:c.RULE.g2:a.TEXT: for any gspcs-scroll-button B if the state of B is inactive then change the status-region icon-color of B to the value of gspcs-scroll-button-inactive-color
for any gspcs-scroll-button B if the state of B is active then change the status-region icon-color of B to the value of gspcs-scroll-button-active-color

g2:c.FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: Scroll an Item at a Time

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: SCROLL-AN-ITEM-AT-A-TIME
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: the scroll-a-page-at-a-time-flag of the item is true
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: conclude that the scroll-a-page-at-a-time-flag of the item is false

g2:c.RULE.g2:a.TEXT:
{*** Controls scrolling followers in "one-at-a-time" mode ***}
for any item IT1 for any item SCROLLING-PARTNER that is a-scrolling-follower-of IT1 whenever IT1 is moved then transfer SCROLLING-PARTNER to the workspace of IT1 at (the item-x-position of SCROLLING-PARTNER, the item-y-position of IT1)

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: SCROLL-A-PAGE-AT-A-TIME
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: the scroll-a-page-at-a-time-flag of the item is false
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: conclude that the scroll-a-page-at-a-time-flag of the item is true

g2:c.BORDERLESS-FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT:
Instances of GSPCS-COLUMN-HEADING must be filled out with the following information:
1) The attribute name of the value displayed in the column 2) The text font-size of the column values 3) The text colors of the column values
GSPCS-SAMPLE-COLUMN-HEADING is an example of a user-defined subclass that has specific properties i.e. size, color.

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: SCROLL
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: the state of the item is active

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Toggle connections
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: change the stripe-color of every gspcs-permanent-relation C to (if the stripe-color of C is foreground then the symbol transparent else the symbol foreground)

g2:c.BORDERLESS-FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT:
1. Scroll through transient items only, unless procedures are modified to make permanent items transient while transfering.
2. Features: Scroll a page or an item at a time. Table entry configurable for: column header text column colors column font-sized attribute value shown in column Place an object into a column instead of just a message.
